title: We’ve been serving the wrong audience
description: The Olivia Nuzzi/RFK Jr. and Michael Wolff/Jeffrey Epstein scandals weren’t just breaches of journalism ethics — they were a mirror held up to something most of us already know, but don’t want to admit: We’ve gotten too close to the people we cover. I get how it happens. When you’re covering the same beat for...
